row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DMTOOL.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode !
@echo off
if not exist "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#" ( mkdir "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#" echo>> "&UC4RB_BACKUP_XML#" )
cd /d "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#"
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm GetDeploymentProfileID -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? -app "&UC4RB_RM_APP_NAME#" -pfl "&UC4RB_RM_PROFILE_NAME#" | findstr /C:"PROFILE ID:" > "&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
if not %errorlevel% == 0 ( echo "Cannot find Profile ID from the given input. Rollback will not be available. Exiting ..." exit 0 )
setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion
:CASE "UNIX"
if [ ! -d "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#" ] ; then mkdir -p "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#" touch "&UC4RB_BACKUP_XML#" fi
cd "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#"
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" profileID=`java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm GetDeploymentProfileID -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? -app "&UC4RB_RM_APP_NAME#" -pfl "&UC4RB_RM_PROFILE_NAME#" | grep "^PROFILE ID:"` :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
if [ -z "$profileID" ] ; then echo "Cannot find Profile ID from the given input. Rollback will not be available. Exiting ..." exit 0 fi
profileID=`echo "$profileID" | sed 's/PROFILE ID: //'` echo "Profile ID: $profileID"
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm RmFullExport -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? -mt DeploymentProfileTarget -fi "&UC4RB_BACKUP_XML#" ? --where "system_deployment_profile.system_id eq '$profileID'" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
cat "&UC4RB_BACKUP_XML#"
:OTHER
:ENDSWITCH
